statements: SELECT * FROM GeneticMutations
SELECT mutation_id, gene_name, mutation_type FROM GeneticMutations WHERE population_id = 1
SELECT gene_name, observation_date FROM GeneticMutations WHERE mutation_type = 'Insertion' ORDER BY observation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM GeneticMutations WHERE gene_name LIKE 'BRCA%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_mutations FROM GeneticMutations
SELECT * FROM GeneticMutations WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM GeneticMutations WHERE population_id = 1 ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalMutations FROM GeneticMutations;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type, observation_date FROM GeneticMutations WHERE mutation_type = 'Frame Shift' AND population_id = 2 ORDER BY observation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM GeneticMutations WHERE population_id IN (1, 3) AND observation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM populations;
SELECT id, population_name, total_individuals FROM populations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT id, population_name, total_individuals FROM populations ORDER BY total_individuals DESC;
SELECT id, population_name, country FROM populations WHERE total_individuals > 1000;
SELECT id, population_name, country FROM populations WHERE tracking_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type = 'Substitution';
SELECT id, gene_name, occurrence_date FROM mutations WHERE population_id IS NULL;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM mutations WHERE population_id IN (SELECT id FROM populations WHERE country = 'USA');
SELECT * FROM mutations ORDER BY occurrence_date DESC, gene_name ASC;
SELECT id, gene_name, mutation_type, occurrence_date FROM mutations WHERE gene_name LIKE 'BRAF%' AND occurrence_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE mutation_id = 1;
SELECT mutation_name, population_id FROM mutations WHERE is_detected = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM populations WHERE country_code = 'USA';
SELECT disease_name, mutation_id, population_id FROM diseases WHERE mutation_id = 3 AND population_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM populations ORDER BY total_individuals DESC;
SELECT mutation_name, is_detected FROM mutations WHERE mutation_id = 1;
SELECT population_name, total_individuals FROM populations WHERE country_code = 'USA';
SELECT disease_name, population_name FROM diseases JOIN populations ON diseases.population_id = populations.population_id;
SELECT mutation_name, population_name FROM mutations JOIN populations ON mutations.population_id = populations.population_id WHERE mutations.is_detected = true;
SELECT * FROM mutations JOIN diseases ON mutations.mutation_id = diseases.mutation_id WHERE mutations.population_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM mutations;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM mutations WHERE population_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT population_name, region FROM populations ORDER BY region DESC;
SELECT sample_id, sample_date FROM samples WHERE population_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY sample_date ASC;
SELECT disease_name FROM diseases WHERE mutation_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003';
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE gene_name='BRCA1';
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM mutations WHERE population_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM samples WHERE sample_date>'2021-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT gene_name FROM mutations;

SELECT populations.region, samples.sample_date, diseases.disease_name FROM populations JOIN samples ON populations.population_id = samples.population_id JOIN diseases ON samples.mutation_id = diseases.mutation_id;
SELECT * FROM Disease ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM Population WHERE location = 'CityA';
SELECT mutation_type, mutation_description FROM Mutation WHERE id = '579f1c2c-49b2-45f8-becb-ec6cbb9d3bda';
SELECT * FROM Individual ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT investigator, date FROM Investigation WHERE individual_id = 'fab13a5d-5023-48c3-9188-d8f794f7f645';
SELECT * FROM Mutation WHERE mutation_type = 'Insertion';
SELECT individual_id, investigator FROM Investigation WHERE DATE(date) = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, location FROM Population WHERE id IN (SELECT population_id FROM Individual WHERE age > 30);
SELECT * FROM Disease WHERE description LIKE '%genetic%';
SELECT id, mutation_type FROM Mutation WHERE LENGTH(mutation_description) > 50;
